# t-test formula

$t_{obs} = \frac{\bar{x} - \mu}{\frac{s}{\sqrt{n}}} = \frac{71 - 80}{\frac{13}{\sqrt{10}}} = -2.189$

_where_,

$\bar{x}$ = sample mean

$\mu$ = population me

$s$ = sample standard deviation
